nodes.text: Chronicling The Clone Wars was a series of reference articles that were on the Star Wars Blog from September 14, 2012 to May 30, 2013. They were authored by Leland Chee to reconcile the chronology of Star Wars: The Clone Wars, as well as how they fit into the overall Expanded Universe due to several questions asked about them by various Star Wars fans.

The blog series ended on May 30, 2013, in preparation for the June 3 release of Jason Fry's Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Episode Guide. However, Chee did not dismiss the possibility of creating a subsequent blog that dealt with the bonus arcs in the series.
